message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 8-1-1, translated into all languages

data.en: 8.1 Sustaining economic growth per capita according to national circumstances and, in particular, an annual growth of at least 7% of the gross domestic product [GDP] in the least developed countries
data.pt: 8.1 Sustentar o crescimento económico per capita de acordo com as circunstâncias nacionais e, em particular, um crescimento anual de pelo menos 7% do produto interno bruto [PIB] nos países menos desenvolvidos
